location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript; coloured ink and crayon on tracing linen.Dimensions: 280 x 187mm, on sheet 331 x 202mm.

mods.abstract: Sketch map showing Gwadar and the surrounding region. Three lines in crayon depict proposed lines for the undefined boundary between Gwadar and the state of Kalat. The map also provides some indication of relief and hydrology. The scale is given as 1 inch = 8 miles.
